20110118233700.000|20110118233703.000|CC1|IN NEW YORK CITY.

20110118235711.000|20110118235711.000|CC1|    We were the first           
20110118235711.000|20110118235713.000|CC1|    to ban smoking on airplanes.
20110118235713.000|20110118235713.000|CC1|            The first to have   
20110118235713.000|20110118235713.000|CC1|            smoke-free bars     
20110118235713.000|20110118235715.000|CC1|            and restaurants.    
20110118235715.000|20110118235715.000|CC1|    All while saving            
20110118235715.000|20110118235715.000|CC1|    over $86 billion            
20110118235715.000|20110118235720.000|CC1|    in health care costs...     
20110118235720.000|20110118235723.000|CC1|    and over a million lives.   
20110118235723.000|20110118235725.000|CC1|    We've done a good job.      
20110118235725.000|20110118235727.000|CC1|But even if you were born today,
20110118235727.000|20110118235727.000|CC1|you'd still grow up in a world  
20110118235727.000|20110118235727.000|CC1|where tobacco kills             
20110118235727.000|20110118235730.000|CC1|more people...                  
20110118235730.000|20110118235730.000|CC1|    than AIDS, drugs, alcohol,  
20110118235730.000|20110118235735.000|CC1|    murder and car crashes...   
20110118235735.000|20110118235736.000|CC1|                combined.       
20110118235736.000|20110118235911.000|CC1|We have a lot more work to do.
